Text:
Oh, shoot... Why'd you miss the sprints?..

Please-please-please, if possible, try to post the sprints... I have good biathlon coverage on TV, but you are my only source for FIS races. And I love sprints the most! :((
Oh, by the way, do you know if they will perhaps be repeating them?
They do repeat some of the longer races during the week but not this one.
